app.description: Parse the ticket description by using the given regex and sets the result in a custom field
app.name: Parse and Set

fields.label: Fields
fields.helpText: Comma separated list of fields to match against the given regexp (ex: subject, description, custom_field_99999999)

result_field.label: Result
result_field.helpText: A free text custom field ID in which the result of the match will be stored
